mainText: Semero's mind reeled. He didn't understand what wizard was asking for. "What?" he stammered, his voice barely audible.

Wizard pulled out a vial of purple liquid from a bag on his belt and held it up. "This is a medicine for Arvanka," he said, his voice low and menacing. "I will give it to you if you say that you will voluntarily give me your face."

Semero's mind raced as he tried to make sense of what was happening. He looked at Arvanka, who was still curled up against cave wall, her breathing shallow and labored. He knew he had to do something, but he couldn't bring himself to agree to wizard's demands.
Wizard's voice grew even more stern, "Not enough time, Semero," he said, his eyes boring into prince's.
talkOption: Finally, Semero found his voice and asked, "Why do you need my appearance?"
talkOptionResult: Wizard's lips twisted into a sly smile as he replied, "To rule a kingdom." Semero felt a sinking feeling in his stomach as he realized gravity of situation. He knew he had to make a decision, and fast.
